Description:
A LIFESTYLE OF SOPHISTICATION
Position perfect, with an inner city retreat feel, you will fall in love with this immaculate sun drenched town residence.
- 3 large bedrooms - 2nd bedroom with BIR, master with WIR and ensuite
- Brilliant north facing open plan living and dining area - polished boards, reverse cycle heating/cooling
- Sliding doors opening to a huge entertainers terrace
- Stunning well appointed kitchen- gas Miele cooktop, dishwasher, breakfast bar, walk in pantry
- 2 sleek bathrooms - main with bath; Concealed laundry; Separate powder room
- High ceilings; loads of natural light; additional functional study nook area; loads of storage space
- Lock up garage with internal access plus a carport
Highly sought after location close to Darling Gardens, Queens Parade cafes and restaurants, brilliant schools, the Merri Creek, bike paths, public transport & loads more!
Conditions of entry - IDENTIFICATION and contact number required, otherwise entry may be refused.
Property Code: 6174

Description:
Rooftop Garden
This spacious townhouse located approx 400m from the Merri Creek Trail has been meticulously looked after by the original tenants since August 2013. Currently on a month to month lease paying $575pw they will be happy to sign on again for another 2 years if not sold with vacant possession.
Comprising two bedrooms with built in robes, 2 bathrooms, euro laundry, open plan kitchen/meals/lounge area and a tandem garage large enough for two cars that has been converted into a home office.
Features include air conditioning, polished floor boards , stone top benches in wet areas, dishwasher, balcony off the lounge and second bedroom whilst the best of all is the fabulous roof top garden.
For an inspection please see the OFI times or call Adam Caruso on 0416102725.
Insights: 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Immaculate and Stylish Living

- 2 bedrooms - built in robes

- Undercover entertainer's terrace

Description:
PERIOD GRACE AND SPACE, SUPERBLY POSITIONED
This wider than normal Victorian terrace, moments from Clifton Hill Village, station, schools and the Darling Gardens offers updated accommodation and the ideal floor plan on an impressive north-facing allotment with ROW access. The classic period appeal blends well with the more modern updates with two double bedrooms opening from an elegant double-arched hallway, large central bathroom (separate bath and shower) and separate laundry, well-proportioned living and dining room, fully appointed kitchen leading to a paved rear courtyard garden that allows for further potential to extend (STCA) taking advantage of the deep northerly orientation & ROW access. Other features include; heating, split system air conditioning, alarm system, polished floor boards, high ceilings & period features plus storeroom. This is a very appealing inner city home or investment opportunity for the astute buyer! Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
Exciting Inner-City Scenario
This absolutely charming Federation cottage is an irresistible slice of Clifton Hill heritage superbly nestled in one of the area's best streets. Comfortable, convenient and packed with potential; first-home buyers and investors will relish the opportunity presented by this classic semi-detached residence putting you perfectly in the inner-city picture close to Darling Gardens, Queens Parade cafes, vibrant Smith-Brunswick Streets and trams. Framed by handsome facade and fabulous rear courtyard garden, this exceedingly appealing home includes two sizable bedrooms, delightful living and dining rooms, large kitchen, modern bathroom, separate laundry, gas heating and storage shed. An exceptional entry-level opportunity affording exciting scope to stylishly renovate when ready.
Nicholas Corby : 0418 512 978

Description:
Extra Wide, Warm & Wonderfully Located
Privately positioned at the preferred parkland end of the street, a secluded high-wall courtyard precedes this wide and welcoming terrace home's surprisingly spacious interior, north-facing rear garden and single garage. Previous renovation has created a warm, character-filled home where a classic Victorian layout opens into a lofty, cathedral ceiling space designed for flexible living over two levels. Moments to Merri Creek trails, cafes, shops, train station and schools, this superbly proportioned terrace offers arched hallway, two sizable bedrooms, mezzanine sitting room (possible 3rd bedroom or study), impressive dining and living areas, bright kitchen, central bathroom with ensuite access, floor heating, open fireplaces, feature stained glass window and large sun-filled courtyard garden with water feature.
Nicholas Corby : 0418 512 978

Description:
SPACIOUS EDWARDIAN, 2 STREET FRONTAGES
This wide and elegant residence, renovated with scope for extension (STCA) on a deep block with access and parking from Clifton Avenue, is superbly situated close to Village cafes, primary schools, Yarra parkland and station. It incorporates two double bedrooms and a well-proportioned sitting room opening from a wide fretwork-trimmed hallway, an expansive informal living and dining area flowing to a paved and landscaped garden with northerly light, well-equipped kitchen, and delightful atrium adjoining period-style bathroom. Features include richly polished Baltic floors, fine period detail, ducted heating, split-system air conditioning and generous storage. Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
Light-Filled Terrace In A Fantastic Position
Conveying a classic feel that reflects its success as a comfortable period home, this light-filled timber Edwardian is ready when you are to step up in style for fabulous village living. So central that cafes, Royal Hotel, schools, Quarries Park and Clifton Hill station are just seconds away; this elevated semi-detached home is immediately inviting with bright polished floorboards and high ceiling roses framing north-oriented rooms of impressive proportions. Ideal to enjoy now and further improve adding value when desired, first-home buyers and investors will love the single-storey layout offering two large bedrooms, sunny living room, kitchen and meals area, new bathroom and toilet, laundry, gas heating and rear courtyard with ROW.
Vincent Taylor : 0417 586 271

Description:
Light, Bright and Fantastically Spacious ....
On the upper level of this modern complex of only 14 dwellings, built over two levels this two bedroom apartment has all the right attributes for a home or sound investment.
Don’t be fooled by the railway siding, the use of double glazing in casement windows gives the faintest hint of the position and the elevation makes the most of natural light with some superb views to the CBD skyline and easterly Dandenong’s.
The main bedroom, of king proportions has a box feature window, ample robes and storage and is separated from the generous second by a central gleaming bathroom with shower and bath with European laundry and completing upstairs, a study nook.
The main level is all open spacious living with full width floor to ceiling glass to a great barbecuing or casual beverage balcony with a larger than normal kitchen including large walk in pantry plus a powder room. Featuring a light neutral decor, reverse cycle air conditioning, security entry, storage cage and wait for it ... 2 adjoining car spaces
Located in the vibrant Clifton Hill village with renowned Royal Hotel, only a 30 second dash to the city train and 8 minutes later on a CBD platform, a stroll through Mayors Park to the delights of Queens Parade or a bike ride to almost anywhere.
Insights: 12/56 John Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2015 and 21 other 2 bedroom unit in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Delightful Edwardian Residence Coveted Lifestyle Position
Showcasing an impressive 2 Street Frontage, is this wonderful semi detached period home.
Located in popular Clifton Hill Village, taking full advantage of the close proximity to parkland, bike trails, cafes, restaurants, public transport and exclusive boutique retail.
The property features 2 bedrooms (BIR’s) in the main house, a tranquil first floor self contained studio/artist retreat or 3rd bedroom, groovy kitchen/meals with adjoining dining, family sized bathroom with large corner spa bath and charming living room.
Presented in comfortable order throughout with the opportunity to renovate and add further value, the property boasts high ceilings, retaining many period features, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, energy saving solar panels, alfresco dining in your north facing courtyard, garage and separate studio access opening on to Abbot Grove.
A perfect place to call home or ideal high capital growth rental investment.
Terms: 10% Deposit and 30/60 or 90 Day Settlement
Land: 232sqm (Approx)
Insights: 34 Caroline Street, CLIFTON HILL VIC 3068 was last sold in 2015 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in CLIFTON HILL have recently been sold.

Description:
Enticing Terrace In An Outstanding Position
Standing out from the crowd from an elevated position with a great sense of space, this delightful terrace is vintage Victorian featuring purpose-built connoisseur's subfloor cellar and reclaimed Blackbutt floorboards from Sydney's Penfolds factory. Conveniently located near exciting cafe/shopping strips, Darling Gardens, schools and trams/trains; this classic home exudes a happy, creative Clifton Hill feel with original period appeal throughout plus a sunny, private courtyard garden with excellent street-like lane ROW. The charming, light-filled interior (re-plumbed, etc with scope to further improve) includes arched hallway, two double bedrooms, built-in-robes, open-plan living/dining room, functional kitchen, bathroom, laundry, gas heating, original high ceilings and open fireplaces.
Belinda Lindsay : 0409 853 769
Insights: 419 Wellington Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2019 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
PERFECTLY POSITIONED AND INCREDIBLY SPACIOUS!
More house than townhouse, this outstanding brick home in a boutique block delivers an enviable city-edge lifestyle with its expansive two-level interior and impressively deep backyard garden. Beyond its attractive facade, the home's immaculate interior highlights three upstairs bedrooms (large master with WIR and city skyline views) and modern central bathroom. Downstairs: big open-plan lounge with open fireplace and dining area, adjoining kitchen with stainless steel appliances, separate laundry and second toilet. Adding to its appeal, the home also includes ducted heating and split-system air conditioning, quality carpets and floors, under-stair storeroom, plus double doors to a decked entertaining area and deep backyard garden complete with storage shed and off-street parking space via ROW. Situated in one of inner-Melbourne's most sought-after neighbourhoods, it's close to Clifton Hill Station, Quarries Park, Merri Creek/Capital City trail, Spensley Street Primary School, Queens Parade shops and cafes. Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
Quintessential Clifton with Exciting Future Scope
On the verge of the village just metres to parkland, trails and school; come into Clifton Hill with complete confidence and transform this 1930s classic into a contemporary lifestyle haven. Offering a 334sqm level allotment (approx.) with off-street parking, this well-maintained timber home exudes character, comfort and incredible potential (STCA) to capitalize on the generous block and outstanding position. A large-proportioned, compact layout is immediately inviting including decorative period ceilings, two spacious bedrooms, charming living room, kitchen and meals area, central bathroom, reverse-cycle heating/cooling, laundry, powder room, covered alfresco patio overlooking rear garden, bungalow and carport. Stroll to cafes, shops and Clifton Hill station.

Description:
The Wright Stuff For An Active Family
A wonderful family lifestyle opportunity with hectares of parkland, trails and adventure playground just metres away; this fabulous double-block fronted Edwardian is ready and waiting to entertain in style. Featuring five bedrooms (upstairs children's wing with study and park views) and two living areas, there's plenty of space to relax and enjoy complemented by a large covered BBQ deck and two-car garaging. An inner-city family haven close to schools, shopping, recreation centre/pool and Clifton Hill station, this attractive home is designed for quality, easy living including lounge room (gas fireplace), family living area with bifold doors to deck, superb kitchen with Miele dual-fuel appliances, two bathrooms, hydronic heating, evaporative cooling, polished floorboards, period features, abundant storage and even an in-built trampoline.

Description:
Stylish city pad or sound investment NO BODY CORP!
Immediately striking, this beautifully appointed townhouse boasts impressive interior living proportions, privacy and multiple outdoor entertaining areas
- Potential rent approximately $750 per week!
- 3 Bedrooms; Master has ensuite and study nook
- Huge open plan living/dining features polished floors; Access to large terrace
- 2 bathrooms plus powder room; Main with bath
- Terrific kitchen; Stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, gas cooking and ample cupboard and bench space
- Ducted heating and reverse cycle air-conditioning
- Private courtyard garden
- Lock up garage with internal access plus 2nd car space
- 133 sqm of living approximately
Fantastic inner-city location, almost opposite The Quarries Park and Ramsden Street Reserve and just moments away from Spensley Street Primary, Yarra River, bike paths, transport and Village cafes.
Conditions of entry - IDENTIFICATION and contact number required, otherwise entry may be refused.

Description:
Refined Elegance in Quiet Seclusion
Secure and secluded opposite parkland with remote-control off-street parking; discover a wealth of period refinement and stylish living beyond the wide block-fronted facade of this restored Victorian residence. Conveniently located moments to Merri Creek parkland and trails, Queens Parade Village, schools and train station, this beautifully-presented home on a compact landscaped block highlights single-level three bedroom plus study, two bathroom accommodation complemented by private garden and a peaceful entertainment deck. A fine family opportunity including arched hallway, living room with marble Jetmaster fireplace, formal dining room, large separate kitchen and adjacent meals area, laundry, ducted heating/cooling, high classical ceilings, polished floorboards, plantation shutters, video intercom, open fireplaces and stained glass windows.
Nicholas Corby : 0418 512 978

Description:
Perfect Space & Light in Parklands Environs
A leafy, peaceful village-style setting with vast expanses of parkland around the corner provides the perfect backdrop to the spacious, light-filled living offered by this secure two-level apartment. Enjoying the complex's garden-set swimming pool and BBQ facilities, this tightly-held apartment is secluded on the first-floor opening to a large, north-facing balcony ideal for entertaining or some quiet, relaxing 'me time'. Minutes to the city and moments to cycling and walking tracks, Dights Falls, cafes and train station; the completely comfortable layout includes three bedrooms with mirror built-in-robes (huge upstairs parents' retreat with ensuite), living and dining room with soaring ceiling, immaculate kitchen, two bathrooms, European laundry, great storage, heating, intercom entry and secure carport on title.
Andrew Simondson : 0412 999 128

Description:
Idyllic Location... Enviable Lifestyle...
Within the delightful environs of Clifton Hill with acres of picturesque parkland at your doorstep is this superb ground floor apartment offering an enviable low maintenance and secure lifestyle choice. The sublime city-edge location moments from Yarra River parks & trails, delightful cafes, shopping and public transport is ideal for the first home buyer, investor or downsizer searching for an apartment with a free flowing design and sizeable courtyard garden.
This single level apartment comprises 2 double bedrooms with robes, open plan living/dining with access to front terrace, well appointed kitchen, bathroom with separate toilet & European laundry, secure undercover car park and huge north facing rear courtyard with direct access to beautifully maintained communal gardens featuring in-ground pool, golf driving net and BBQ.
Further features include split system heating/cooling, floating timber floors, dishwasher, gas cooking and lockable storage shed.

Description:
Ripe For Renovation!
A prized corner position and a sought after location close to the Yarra Parklands and Dights Falls provide an exciting and profitable project for builders and developers (STCA). This former corner store currently offers four principal rooms plus kitchen and bathroom with a rear northerly orientation. There is potential easy car access.
Let your imagination run riot as you create your plans to revitalise this remarkable property and take it into the twenty first century!
